name: CervicalPrecancerDisorders
title: Cervical Precancer Disorders
description: This value set has not been tested in a clinical environment. Please use with caution.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Cervical precancer disorders),(Data Element Scope: Cervical precancer disorders),(Inclusion Criteria: Diagnosis codes based on CIN2, CIN3, HSIL, AIS, and ASC-H cervical histology results, moderate to severe dysplasia, carcinoma in situ. Includes active and inactive codes, knowing that inactive codes are not always updated in an EHR.),(Exclusion Criteria: V codes, vague mention of abnormal or unspecified cytological or histological findings, infections, HPV status, benign neoplasms of cervix, precancers of anus or vagina, cervical cancer.)

concept.display: Carcinoma in situ of cervix uteri
Papanicolaou smear of cervix with atypical squamous cells cannot exclude high grade squamous intraepithelial lesion (ASC-H)
Papanicolaou smear of cervix with high grade squamous intraepithelial lesion (HGSIL)
